articles.title: Luka Doncic, Mavericks dodge Finals sweep by blowing out Celtics - The Washington Post
articles.description: Doncic scores 29 points in only 33 minutes in a game that saw most key players on the bench by midway through the fourth quarter.

articles.author: Lauren Said-Moorhouse, Billy Stockwell
articles.title: Catherine, Princess of Wales attends King’s birthday celebration after revealing ‘good progress’ in cancer treatment - CNN
articles.description: Catherine, Princess of Wales has arrived at Buckingham Palace for Trooping the Colour - the King’s official birthday parade - in what will be her first public appearance since revealing her cancer diagnosis.
articles.content:
Catherine, Princess of Wales has made her first public appearance since being diagnosed with cancer, joining other royals in London for Trooping the Colour, the Kings official birthday parade.

articles.title: Supreme Court’s abortion pill ruling puts new focus on conservative Trump judge in Texas - CNN
articles.description: The Supreme Court’s decision this week rebuffing an effort to restrict access to mifepristone is unlikely to be the final word on the abortion pill.
